H0.text: In humans, the medical condition Hyposmia affects which of the senses. Hearing

H1.text: In humans, the medical condition Hyposmia affects which of the senses. Taste

H2.text: In humans, the medical condition Hyposmia affects which of the senses. Touch

H3.text: In humans, the medical condition Hyposmia affects which of the senses. Smell

A4.text: Hyposmia is a reduced ability to smell and to detect odors.
